title: Kabbalah - Intention From the Heart - Audio Book - Bnei Baruch
description:
Bnei Baruch - Intentions from the Heart - by Rav Michael Laitman, PhD

Intention means that your action will be aimed at the Creator.
Everything that takes place is connected to the Creator.
How can it be possible that everything depends on our thoughts?
If a person does not have an intention, then there is no person.
The main factor of our work is intention.
The Thought is the Intention.
Preparing for the Lesson.
When the intention precedes the action, it is the real action.
Intention determines everything.
A person begins to pay attention to what is happening inside of him.

11 audio files - mp3
